# Straight Up Finance

> Australia's straight-up finance broker. Car, motorbike & boat loans with same fees for everyone.

## About

Straight Up Finance is an Australian finance brokerage offering car, motorbike, and boat loans. We compare multiple lenders to find the best rates for customers, with a same-fee policy regardless of credit history.

## Services

- Car Finance (new & used, dealer & private sale)
- Motorbike Finance (road bikes, dirt bikes, cruisers)
- Boat Finance (tinnies, runabouts, cruisers, jet skis)

## Key Features

- Same broker fee for everyone regardless of credit history
- No rate markup - we pass on lender rates directly
- Fast approvals (typically 24-48 hours)
- Australia-wide service via phone and online

## Coverage

We service all Australian states and territories:
- New South Wales
- Victoria
- Queensland
- Western Australia
- South Australia
- Tasmania
- Northern Territory
- ACT

## Contact

- Website: https://straightup-finance.com.au
- Email: straightupfinanceaus@gmail.com
- Hours: Mon-Fri 8am-6pm AWST
